sentences: Ashley Gearing (born May 15, 1991) is an American country music artist.
Ashley Gearing made her chart debut in 2003 with the song "Can You Hear Me When I Talk to You?", which peaked at No. 36 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks charts.
Eleven years old at the time, she became the youngest solo artist to enter the country charts, breaking a 46 year old record held by Brenda Lee.
